channel.title: Modify Watches: New Products - Orange
channel.description: A list of the new products at Modify Watches.

item.title: King of The Mountain
item.description:
The King of The Mountain comes with one Orange watch face and one Orchid strap. the watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match faces and straps of all styles from your modify collection. the strap is made from a soft and comfortable silicone material, the face is made from a scratch-res..

Price: $45.00
item.content:encoded:
The King of The Mountain comes with one Orange watch face and one Orchid strap. the watch face is removable so that you can mix-and-match faces and straps of all styles from your modify collection. the strap is made from a soft and comfortable silicone material, the face is made from a scratch-res..

Price: $45.00
